column2: Great software! I'm using it with Dropbox/dropsync and tombo pc client.

Brilliant After years of using Tombo
column3: this makes my android device useful. For those of us who live our lives in text files this is superb.

column2: Menu
Finally!!! I have searched high and low for a simple notepad app with safe permissions
column3: saves with encryption and has search capability. I use steganos locknote on my pc and all my passwords are stored 2gether in it. If I need a password I can search through the text for the site by name. Text files are ubiquitous and easily transferred between devices. Who needs silly password managers that force you to enter each password individually into entry forms and save the data in proprietary formats.

column2: Great! Just what I needed for renaming and opening txt files.
Perfect! Waiting this application so long!
Killer app! Fantastic app! Great for organizing text notes. I sync with Tomboy on my PC using dropsync
column3: and it's perfect!! Thank you for making such a great app available! Highly

column2: Waited for this Used Tombo since 2002 on windows.
Sense update 7-11-11 keyboard does not show. after 7-11-11 update the keyboard does not show up on updating or creating files!!
The one missing thing to make Android useful If you organize your whole life with Tombo (like I do) you definitely need this app. A big thanks to the author. Regarding synching
column3: I suggest you try to encourage the author of MyPhoneExplorer to add two-way file synchronization. Then we would have an easy solution. Until then you can activate USB storage and use a Windows synchronization tool like SyncToy or Synkron.

column2: Great app for who as me uses tombo notes. Need a sugestion to keep ... Great app for who as me uses tombo notes. Need a sugestion to keep notes sync with desktop.
Just bit more Would you please consider allow to change font color in edit mode? Thanks hard work!

tomboのデータを引き継げるツールを探していたので、大変重宝してます。欲を言えば、フォルダとファイルの並びを調整出来るように(フォ ... tomboのデータを引き継げるツールを探していたので、大変重宝してます。欲を言えば、フォルダとファイルの並びを調整出来るように(フォルダはファイルと別にソートして欲しい)と、shift-jisのテキストの文末の四角(おそらく改行コード)を消せるようお願いします [追記]対応ありがとうございます
